column2: an A.M. Eatery////"This order was probably the single worst experience I've ever had with Favor.  You can see from my patronage
column4: that I don't say this lightly.  Even after I spoke with my driver on the phone going over the order
column5: the hash browns came completely undone (ordered extra crispy)
column6: 'sandwich I am' was nothing but soyrizo!!  That's right
column7: the rest of the sandwich was not there!!  The hot chocolate was small instead of large
column8: and I got another cold lump of potatoes (?) that I didn't order
column9: came packed with the grill cheese sand.  The thing is
column10: I've ordered this same breakfast twice before and there were no problems anywhere near this.  This ain't right man
